headline: Career killer
pros: Very few responsibilities, so you have lots of free time. Fair salary and benefits.
cons: You develop no transferable skills. No value placed on professional certifications or education.

headline: great people, learned very much
pros: Timber Hill is a leader in the financial markets using cutting edge technology.  It is a place where I learned very much.
cons: it may take a long time to advance to a senior role but in my opinion, it is well worth the time and effort
